title: Ghosts, Demons, and the Craziest Lawsuit in Hollywood History
author: Think Story
comment: This whole time I thought they were pulling the movies straight from the Demonologist book! Glad he got some compensation, they might be from the experiences of the Warrens but he did all the work collecting them and writing them down in a conprehensible format.
